summary_teim: Opening credits and segment of VH1's broadcast of the 2001 Rock Hall inductions. The Righteous Brothers perform.

contents_teim: You've lost that lovin' feelin' (the Righteous Brothers) -- Billy Joel inducts the Righteous Brothers -- The Righteous Brothers accept their award. Bill Medley speaks ; Bobby Hatfield speaks.
